/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the everyday life of the city. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze, providing a canopy of shade against the clear blue sky. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. People can be seen walking on the sidewalk, going about their day, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise tranquil setting. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the vibrant colors of the scene.
